captions.text:
Now, before we do this,
let's go over the ground rules.

No touching
of the hair or face.

I'm gonna straight-up
murder your ass!

Oh!  I did not
see that coming!

- Now I'll be number one.
- No, you won't!

I mean, that really
got out of hand fast.

- It jumped up a notch.
- It did, didn't it?

Yeah, I stabbed
a man in the heart.

I saw that.
Brick killed a guy.

title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy (8/8) Movie CLIP - The News Team Battle (2004) HD
